'''Gaia Wise''' is a British actress and voice actress. She the voice of [[Helm's daughter|Héra]] in the 2024 film ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.imdb.com/title/tt14824600/fullcredits|articlename=Full Cast & Crew|dated=|website=IMDB|accessed=7 August 2022}}</ref>
